articles.description: MATT BARLOW AT LUSAIL STADIUM: Mexico scored for the second time in five minutes at the start of the second half and, suddenly, they had a chance of qualifying for the last 16.
articles.content:
Luis Chavez swerved a searing free kick into the top corner of Saudi Arabia's net and Gerardo Martino blew out his cheeks rans his fingers through his grey hair.
The Mexico boss has witnessed plenty… [+4992 chars]
